TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OdbcConnection : System.Data.Common.DbConnection, ICloneable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcConnection extends System.Data.Common.DbConnection implements class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcConnection Inherits DbConnection Implements ICloneable
public ref class OdbcConnection sealed : System::Data::Common::DbConnection, ICloneable
type OdbcConnection = class inherit DbConnection interface ICloneable

summary.span: 表示資料來源的開啟連接。

span.span: Represents an open connection to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件都代表唯一的連接所使用的連接字串或 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN) 建立與資料來源。An object represents a unique connection to a data source created by using a connection string or ODBC data source name (DSN). 具有用戶端/伺服器資料庫系統，它就相當於伺服器的網路連線項目。With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 根據原生 ODBC 驅動程式，某些方法或屬性所支援的功能物件可能無法使用。Depending on the functionality supported by the native ODBC driver, some methods or properties of an object may not be available. 物件會使用原生資源，例如 ODBC 環境和連接控制代碼。The object uses native resources such as ODBC environment and connection handles. 您應該一律明確地關閉任何開啟藉由呼叫物件或是**Dispose**之前物件會超出範圍，或是藉由將內的連接`Using`陳述式。You should always explicitly close any open objects by calling or **Dispose** before the object goes out of scope, or by placing the connection within a `Using` statement. 不這麼做會使記憶體回收這些原生資源的釋放。Not doing this leaves the freeing of these native resources to garbage collection. 它可能未立即釋放它們。It might not free them immediately. 反而可能最終會導致基礎的驅動程式，來執行資源不足，或達到最大限制。This, in turn, can eventually cause the underlying driver to run out of resources or reach a maximum limit. 這會導致暫時性失敗。This has resulted in intermittent failures. 例如，您可能會遇到`Maximum Connections`-雖然許多連接正在等候被記憶體回收行程的相關錯誤。For example, you might experience `Maximum Connections` -related errors while many connections are waiting to be deleted by the garbage collector. 明確關閉連接可讓您更有效率地使用原生資源，增強延展性並改善整體的應用程式效能。Explicitly closing the connections allows for a more efficient use of native resources, enhancing scalability and improving overall application performance. > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高效能應用程式，您通常必須使用連接共用。To deploy high-performance applications, you frequently must use connection pooling. 不過，當您使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 時，您不必啟用連接共用，因為提供者會自動管理。However, when you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically. 如果有一個的`Execute`方法類別會造成嚴重（例如，SQL Server 嚴重性層級 20 或更新版本），可能會關閉。If one of the `Execute` methods of the class causes a fatal (for example, a SQL Server severity level of 20 or greater), the may close. 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 建立的執行個體的應用程式物件可能需要的所有直接和間接呼叫者有足夠的權限的程式碼，藉由設定宣告式或命令式安全性要求。An application that creates an instance of the object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands. 建立使用的安全性要求物件。 creates security demands by using the object. 使用者可以確認他們的程式碼使用具有足夠的權限物件。Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the object. 使用者和系統管理員也可以使用程式碼存取安全性原則工具 (Caspol.exe) 來修改電腦、 使用者和企業層級的安全性原則。Users and administrators can also use the Code Access Security Policy Tool (Caspol.exe) to modify security policy at the computer, user, and enterprise levels. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。For more information, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md). 如需有關處理警告和參考用訊息，從資料來源的詳細資訊，請參閱[連線事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the data source, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates an and an . 已開啟並設定為屬性。The is opened and set as the property. 此範例接著會呼叫，並關閉連線。The example then calls , and closes the connection. 若要這麼做，傳遞連接字串和查詢字串，是 SQL INSERT 陳述式。To accomplish this, the is passed a connection string and a query string that is an SQL INSERT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection/VB/source.vb#1)]

Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction BeginTransaction() cil managed

summary.span: 開始進行資料來源上的交易。

span.span: Starts a transaction at the data source.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要認可或回復交易，您必須明確地使用或方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要確定.NET Framework 資料提供者，用於 ODBC 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如資料來源所提供。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果您未指定隔離等級，隔離等級所使用的驅動程式所決定。If you do not specify an isolation level, the isolation level will be determined by the driver being used. 若要指定隔離等級方法，使用採用的多載`isolevel`參數。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload that takes the `isolevel` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates an and an . 它也會示範如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A transaction is currently active.
Parallel transactions are not supported.

An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要認可或回復交易，您必須明確地使用或方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要確定.NET Framework 資料提供者，用於 ODBC 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如資料來源所提供。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the data source. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates an and an . 它也會示範如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Sub ChangeDatabase (value As String)

span.span: The database name.

summary.span: 變更與開啟之 相關聯的目前資料庫。

span.span: Changes the current database associated with an open .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`參數必須包含有效的資料庫名稱，並不能包含 null 值，也就是空字串 ("")，或只有空白字元的字串。The `value` parameter must contain a valid database name, and cannot contain a null value, an empty string (""), or a string with only blank characters. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和變更目前的資料庫。The following example creates an and changes the current database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The database name is not valid.
The connection is not open.
Cannot change the database.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉資料來源的連接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法回復任何暫止交易。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然後，它會釋放至連接集區中，連接或關閉連接，如果連接共用已停用。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 如果處理時，會呼叫事件，沒有其他會引發事件。If is called while handling a event, no additional events are fired. 應用程式可以呼叫一個以上的時間，而不會產生例外狀況。An application can call more than one time without generating an exception. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 時，您不必啟用連接共用，因為 ODBC 驅動程式管理員會自動管理。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the ODBC Driver Manager manages this automatically. 如需有關如何啟用和停用連線集區的詳細資訊，請參閱 Microsoft 開放式資料庫連接 (ODBC) 文件。For more information about how to enable and disabling connection pooling, see the Microsoft Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) documentation. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫或是`Dispose`連線、 DataReader 或在任何其他 managed 的物件上`Finalize`您類別的方法。Do not call or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該僅釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 開啟、 顯示的某些屬性，並再關閉連線。The following example creates an , opens it, displays some of its properties, and then closes the connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

Public Overrides Property ConnectionString As String

member this.ConnectionString : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Odbc.Design.OdbcConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Odbc.Design.OdbcConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Odbc.Design.OdbcConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定用來開啟資料來源的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open a data source.

value.span: 包含資料來源名稱之類設定的 ODBC 驅動程式連接字串需要建立初始連接。

span.span: The ODBC driver connection string that includes settings, such as the data source name, needed to establish the initial connection.
The default value is an empty string ("").

value.span: 最大長度為 1024 個字元。

span.span: The maximum length is 1024 characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容設計為儘可能密集地符合 ODBC 連接字串格式。The property is designed to match ODBC connection string format as closely as possible. 時，可以設定只連接已關閉，並將它設定為會將它傳遞，保持不變，驅動程式管理員和基礎驅動程式。The can be set only when the connection is closed, and as soon as it is set it is passed, unchanged, to the Driver Manager and the underlying driver. 因此，如語法必須完全符合驅動程式管理員和基礎驅動程式支援。Therefore, the syntax for the must exactly match what the Driver Manager and underlying driver support. 您可以使用內容，連接至各種資料來源。You can use the property to connect to a variety of data sources. 這包括 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN)。This includes an ODBC data source name (DSN). 下列範例說明幾個可能的連接字串。The following example illustrates several possible connection strings. ``` "Driver={SQL Server};Server=(local);Trusted_Connection=Yes;Database=AdventureWorks;" "Driver={Microsoft ODBC for Oracle};Server=ORACLE8i7;Persist Security Info=False;Trusted_Connection=Yes" "Driver={Microsoft Access Driver (*.mdb)};DBQ=c:\bin\Northwind.mdb" "Driver={Microsoft Excel Driver (*.xls)};DBQ=c:\bin\book1.xls" "Driver={Microsoft Text Driver (*.txt; *.csv)};DBQ=c:\bin" "DSN=dsnname" ``` > [!NOTE] > 不支援.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC`Persist Security Info`其他.NET Framework 資料提供者支援的關鍵字。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support the `Persist Security Info` keyword that is supported by other .NET Framework data providers. 不過，屬性的行為如同`Persist Security Info`已設為`false`。However, the property behaves as if `Persist Security Info` were set to `false`. 這表示您無法擷取的密碼屬性如果在開啟連接。This means that you cannot retrieve the password from the property if the connection has been opened. 當屬性會從讀取已開啟的物件，減去密碼，會傳回連接字串。When the property is read from an object that has been opened, the connection string is returned minus the password. 您無法變更這個行為。因此，如果應用程式需要密碼，將它儲存個別呼叫之前，先。You cannot change this behavior; therefore, if the application requires the password, store it separately before calling . 許多字串中指定的設定都有對應的唯讀屬性 (例如`Server=(local)`，它會對應到屬性)。Many of the settings specified in the string have corresponding read-only properties (for example, `Server=(local)`, which corresponds to the property). 開啟連接時，除了偵測到錯誤之後，就會更新這些屬性。These properties are updated after the connection is opened, except when an error is detected. 在此情況下，會更新任何屬性。In this case, none of the properties are updated. 屬性 (例如) 傳回只有預設設定或指定這些設定。 properties (such as ) return only default settings or those settings specified in the . 在 Microsoft.NET Framework 1.0 版中，連接字串的驗證，才會進行應用程式呼叫方法。In the Microsoft .NET Framework version 1.0, validation of the connection string does not occur until an application calls the method. 它是基礎 ODBC 驅動程式，若要驗證的連接字串的責任。It is the responsibility of the underlying ODBC driver to validate the connection string. 如果連接字串包含無效或不受支援的屬性，驅動程式可能會引發在執行階段。If the connection string contains invalid or unsupported properties, the driver may raise an at run time. 不過，在.NET Framework 1.1 版和更新版本中，連接字串的一些基本驗證，就會發生當您設定屬性。However, in the .NET Framework version 1.1 and later versions, some basic validation of the connection string occurs as soon as you set the property. 此時，資料提供者會確認連接字串是否符合 「 關鍵字 = value;..."格式，但它不會驗證是否為有效的關鍵字或值。At that time, the data provider verifies that the connection string meets the "keyword=value;..." format, but it does not verify whether keywords or values are valid. 當應用程式呼叫時，將會執行基礎 ODBC 驅動程式的其餘驗證方法。The remaining verification is performed by the underlying ODBC driver when the application calls the method. ODBC 連接字串的語法如下：An ODBC connection string has the following syntax: ``` connection-string ::= empty-string[;] | attribute[;] | attribute; connection-string empty-string ::= attribute ::= attribute-keyword=attribute-value | DRIVER=[{]attribute-value[}] attribute-keyword ::= DSN | UID | PWD | driver-defined-attribute-keyword attribute-value ::= character-string driver-defined-attribute-keyword ::= identifier ``` 其中`character-string`有零個或多個字元;`identifier`有一或多個字元;`attribute-keyword`不區分大小寫;`attribute-value`可以區分大小寫，而且 DSN 關鍵字的值不會不只包含空白。where `character-string` has zero or more characters; `identifier` has one or more characters; `attribute-keyword` is not case sensitive; `attribute-value` can be case sensitive; and the value of the DSN keyword does not consist only of blanks. 因為連接字串和初始設定檔案文法關鍵字和屬性值應避免包含字元集 []{}(）; 嗎？\* = ！ @ 不括在大括號。Because of connection string and initialization file grammar, keywords and attribute values should be avoided that contain the characters []{}(),;?\*=!@ not enclosed with braces. DSN 關鍵字的值不能只包含空格，並不能包含開頭空白。The value of the DSN keyword cannot consist only of blanks and should not contain leading blanks. 系統資訊的文法，因為關鍵字和資料來源名稱不能包含反斜線 (\\) 字元。Because of the grammar of the system information, keywords and data source names cannot contain the backslash (\\) character. 應用程式就不必 Driver 關鍵字之後加入括號括住屬性值，除非該屬性包含分號 （;），在這種情況下大括號所需。Applications do not have to add braces around the attribute value after the Driver keyword unless the attribute contains a semicolon (;), in which case the braces are required. 如果驅動程式接收的屬性值包含大括號，驅動程式不應該移除它們，但它們應該會傳回的連接字串的一部分。If the attribute value that the driver receives includes braces, the driver should not remove them but they should be part of the returned connection string. 以大括弧括住的 DSN 或連接字串值 ({})，其中包含任何字元集 []{}(）; 嗎？\* = ！ @ 便會傳遞至驅動程式。A DSN or connection string value enclosed with braces ({}) that contains any of the characters []{}(),;?\*=!@ is passed intact to the driver. 不過，當您使用這些字元在關鍵字時，驅動程式管理員會傳回錯誤，當您使用檔案名稱 （dsn），但將連接字串傳遞給一般連接字串的驅動程式。However, when you use these characters in a keyword, the Driver Manager returns an error when you work with file DSNs, but passes the connection string to the driver for regular connection strings. 請避免使用內嵌的大括號中關鍵字值。Avoid using embedded braces in a keyword value. 連接字串可能包含任意數目的驅動程式定義的關鍵字。The connection string may include any number of driver-defined keywords. DRIVER 關鍵字不會使用來自系統的資訊，因為驅動程式必須定義足夠的關鍵字，讓驅動程式可以連線到資料來源的連接字串中使用的資訊。Because the DRIVER keyword does not use information from the system, the driver must define enough keywords so that a driver can connect to a data source using only the information in the connection string. 驅動程式定義的關鍵字，才能連接到資料來源。The driver defines which keywords are required to connect to the data source. 如果連接字串中重複任何關鍵字，則將選取的值不保證。If any keywords are repeated in the connection string, there is no guarantee which value will be selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果 ODBC 驅動程式支援連接字串長度超過 1024年個字元，您可以使用資料來源名稱 (DSN) 超過最大長度限制。If an ODBC driver supports connection strings longer than 1024 characters, you can use a data source name (DSN) to exceed the maximum length limitation.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ConnectionTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ConnectionTimeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在終止嘗試並產生錯誤前嘗試建立連接的等待時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待連接開啟的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for a connection to open.
The default value is 15 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於 SQL Server 和 OLE DB 的.NET Framework 資料提供者，ODBC 的.NET Framework 資料提供者不支援將這個屬性設定為連接字串值，因為它不是有效的 ODBC 連接關鍵字。Unlike the .NET Framework data providers for SQL Server and OLE DB, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support setting this property as a connection string value, because it is not a valid ODBC connection keyword. 若要指定連線逾時，設定屬性，然後再呼叫。To specify a connection time-out, set the property before calling . 這相當於設定 ODBC `SQLSetConnectAttr` SQL_ATTR_LOGIN_TIMOUT 屬性。This is equivalent to setting the ODBC `SQLSetConnectAttr` SQL_ATTR_LOGIN_TIMOUT attribute.

span.span: The value set is less than 0.

summary.span: 取得目前資料庫或要在連接開啟之後使用的資料庫名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.
The name of the current database.

value.span: 直到連接開啟之前，預設值都是空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("") until the connection is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一開始，屬性設定連接字串中。At first, the property is set in the connection string. 屬性可以更新使用方法。The property can be updated by using the method. 如果您變更目前的資料庫使用 SQL 陳述式或方法，會傳送參考用訊息，並再更新的屬性。If you change the current database using an SQL statement or the method, an informational message is sent and then the property is updated. 擷取屬性就相當於呼叫 ODBC 函數`SQLGetInfo`與`Attribute`參數設定為 SQL_ATTR_CURRENT_CATALOG。Retrieving the property is equivalent to calling the ODBC function `SQLGetInfo` with the `Attribute` parameter set to SQL_ATTR_CURRENT_CATALOG. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和變更目前的資料庫。The following example creates an and changes the current database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EnlistDistributedTransaction(class System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 要登記之現有 的參考。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 將指定的異動登記為分散式異動。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新 ADO.NET 2.0 中是支援的使用編列到分散式交易中的方法。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體，請**EnlistTransaction**會充分利用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，讓最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**針對此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 若要登記現有的分散式的交易使用，您可以繼續方法，如果已停用自動登記。You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在現有的分散式異動中登記可確保，如果認可或回復交易，在資料來源的程式碼所做的修改會也認可或回復就行了。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction makes sure that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. 如需有關分散式交易的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 如果傳回的例外狀況已經開始使用。 returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 不過，如果交易是在資料來源所啟動的本機異動 (比方說，是藉由明確執行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 陳述式使用物件)，回復本機交易和登記在現有的為要求的分散式的交易。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 您不會收到通知，本機交易已回復，而且會負責管理任何本機交易無法啟動使用。You will not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 要登記之現有 的參考。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 將指定的異動登記為分散式異動。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新 ADO.NET 2.0 中是支援的使用編列到分散式交易中的方法。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體，請**EnlistTransaction**會充分利用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，讓最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，它會使用**System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction**物件。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object. 它也會有稍微不同的語意： 一旦連線明確的交易上編列，無法取消登錄或另一個交易中登記，直到第一筆交易完成為止。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 如需有關分散式交易的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String) As DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要傳回之結構描述的名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

summary.span: 使用結構描述名稱的特定名稱，傳回這個 之資料來源的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified name for the schema name.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`collectionName`為 null，包含所有可用的中繼資料和任何限制的相關資訊。When `collectionName` is null, the contains information about all available metadata and any restrictions. > [!NOTE] > 所有適用的限制`SQLStatistics`方法也會套用至`ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes")`集合。All restrictions that apply to the `SQLStatistics` method also apply to the `ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes")` collection.

related.span: 從資料庫取得結構描述資訊

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: override System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要傳回之結構描述的名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 指定所要求之結構描述的限制值集合。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 使用結構描述名稱的特定字串和限制值的特定字串陣列，傳回這個 的資料來源的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`collectionName`指定為 null，包含所有中繼資料，可供使用，以及其限制的相關資訊。When `collectionName` is specified as null, the contains information about all the metadata that is available, and its restrictions. `restrictionValues`可以提供參數*n*深度的特定集合的限制集合所指定的值。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 為了特定限制，設定值，並設定其他限制的值，您必須設定為空值，然後放入您想要為指定值的限制中的適當值的上述限制。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you must set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 這個範例是"Tables"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合中有三個的限制 （資料庫、 擁有者，以及資料表名稱），而且您想要取回只有資料表擁有者 」 Carl，「 相關聯則需要將在至少下列值： null、 「 Carl 」。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name), and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl," then you would need to pass in at least the following values: null, "Carl". 如果不傳入的限制值，預設值會用於這項限制中。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 這是相同的對應為 null，傳入不同的參數值為空字串傳遞。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在此情況下，則為空字串 ("") 會被視為指定參數的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. > [!NOTE] > 套用至 SQLStatistics 方法的所有限制會都套用至 ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes") 集合。All restrictions that apply to SQLStatistics method will apply to the ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes") collection.

related.span: 從資料庫取得結構描述資訊

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event InfoMessage As OdbcInfoMessageEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 ODBC 驅動程式傳送警告或資訊訊息時。

span.span: Occurs when the ODBC driver sends a warning or an informational message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要處理的警告或伺服器所傳送的告知性訊息的用戶端應該建立委託以接聽此事件。Clients that want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an delegate to listen to this event.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 所指定的屬性設定，開啟與資料來源的連接。

span.span: Opens a connection to a data source with the property settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接集區中繪製的開啟連接，如果有的話。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否則，它會建立新的連接到資料來源。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果超出範圍，它代表的連接不會關閉自動。If the goes out of scope, the connection it represents does not close automatically. 因此，您必須明確地關閉連接呼叫，**處置**，或是藉由將內的連接`Using`陳述式。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling , **Dispose**, or by placing the connection within a `Using` statement.

exception.span: 這個方法的功能不受基底類別的支援，因此必須改為在衍生類別中實作。

span.span: The functionality of this method is unsupported in the base class and must be implemented in a derived class instead.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ReleaseObjectPool() cil managed

summary.span: 指示 ODBC 驅動程式管理員環境控制代碼可在釋放最後一個基礎連接時釋放。

span.span: Indicates that the ODBC Driver Manager environment handle can be released when the last underlying connection is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReleaseObjectPool` 可以呼叫以釋放 ODBC 環境控制代碼。`ReleaseObjectPool` can be called to release the ODBC environment handle. 您可以呼叫這個方法，如果，比方說，連接物件不會使用一次。You might want to call this method if, for example, the connection object will not be used again. 在環境中的所有連線都關閉時，可以處置環境。When all connections in the environment are closed, the environment can be disposed. 請注意，單獨呼叫此方法不會實際釋放存在於環境中的作用中連接。Note that calling the method alone does not actually release the active connections that exist in the environment. 下列之前必須達到最後處置環境：The following must occur before the environment is finally disposed: 1. 呼叫釋放從環境的物件。Call to release the object from the environment. 2. 允許的逾時時間的每個連接物件。Allow each connection object to time out. 3. 呼叫 。Call . 4. 叫用記憶體回收。Invoke garbage collection. 相反地，如果您呼叫上所有使用中連接，並叫用記憶體回收，但不要呼叫，環境保留的資源保持可用。Conversely, if you call on all active connections, and invoke garbage collection, but do not call , the resources reserved for the environment remain available. 已釋放環境控制代碼之後，新的要求會建立新的環境。After an environment handle is released, a request for a new creates a new environment.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ServerVersion As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ServerVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，其包含用戶端連接之伺服器的版本。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the version of the server to which the client is connected.
The version of the connected server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不支援基礎的 ODBC 驅動程式，空字串 ("") 會傳回。If is not supported by the underlying ODBC driver, an empty string ("") is returned. 屬性會採用格式 '*# #。 # #。 # # #*，' 其中前兩個數字的主要版本、 接下來的兩個數字是次要版本，而且末四碼的發行版本。The property takes the form '*##.##.####*,' where the first two digits are the major version, the next two digits are the minor version, and the last four digits are the release version. 驅動程式必須呈現在這種形式的產品版本，但是也可以附加做為字串的特定產品版本 (例如，"04.01.0000 Rdb 4.1")。The driver must render the product version in this form but can also append the product-specific version as a string (for example, "04.01.0000 Rdb 4.1"). 此字串會採用 '*major.minor.build*' 其中*主要*並*次要*會剛好兩位數和*建置*確切為四個數字。This string takes the form '*major.minor.build*' where *major* and *minor* are exactly two digits and *build* is exactly four digits.

span.span: The connection is closed.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property State As ConnectionState
public: virtual property System::Data::ConnectionState State { System::Data::ConnectionState get(); };

summary.span: 取得連線目前的狀態。

span.span: Gets the current state of the connection.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下被允許狀態變更：The following are allowed state changes: - 從`Closed`要`Open`，並使用方法。From `Closed` to `Open`, using the method. - 從`Open`要`Closed`，使用或是**處置**方法。From `Open` to `Closed`, using either the or **Dispose** method. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫屬性上的開啟連接會增加應用程式的額外負荷，因為每個這類呼叫會導致 SQL_ATTR_CONNECTION_DEAD 呼叫基礎 ODBC 驅動程式來判斷連接是否仍然有效。Calling the property on an open connection increases application overhead because each such call causes a SQL_ATTR_CONNECTION_DEAD call to the underlying ODBC driver to determine whether the connection is still valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
